ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 47 Professor, Associate Professor Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 28, 2025, 17:40 IST
 Employees State Insurance Corporation Limited
 47 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Aug-2025 |  Haryana |  Salary : 67,700 to 118,500




FOLLOW

The Employees' State Insurance Corporation Haryana (ESIC Haryana) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 47 Professor, Associate Professor, and Assistant Professor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, MD/MS can apply for the ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in  Haryana.

ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Professor	18	MBBS, MD/MS
Assistant Professor	18
Associate Professor	11

ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 69 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection is based on the interview.

ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

All Other Candidates: Rs. 500/-
SC/ST, Ex-servicemen & PH Candidates: Nil.

ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 67,700/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,18,500/- per month.
How to Apply for the ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents.
Carry all the documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

Faculty Reading Hall, Academic Block, ESIC Medical College & Hospital, Faridabad.

Important Dates:

Starting date	24-08-2025
Closing date	04-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
